item.title: Self-Help Books
item.description: I love investing in my self by learning the new stuff because I feel they are a great way of understanding how the world works. Here is a list of my favourite self help books. 1. A mind for numbers by Barbara Oakley This book by Barbara Oakley will unarguably the best book I have read till date which has really helped me in improving my techniques of learning. You will be amazed to see that we were studying the wrong way all these years.
